FORBIDDEN().details: Thrown when the caller is not authorized to call the function

INVALID_PARAMETER().details: Thrown when the passed parameter is invalid

addBoost(uint256[],uint256[],int96).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

params._dropIds: : Drop IDs array required to gain the Boost
params._increase: : Amount of AB Token increased (in token/seconds) to be granted by the boost
params._quantities: : Quantities of tokens (corresponding to the Drop IDs) to be held to gain the Boost

returns._0: : the total amount of boost allocated to the given address

grantSpecialBoost(address,int96).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

params._specialBoost: : Amount of AB Token increased (in token/seconds) to be granted by the special boost
params._to: : User address to receive the special boost

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeSpecialBoost(address,int96).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

params._from: : User address to reduce the special boost from
params._specialBoost: : Amount of AB Token flow to be decreased (in token/seconds)

setABRegistry(address).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

setABRelay(address).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

setABToken(address).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

params._baseFlow: : new base flow to be set
params._dropId: : Associated Drop ID corresponding to the token transferred

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBoost(uint256,int96).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

params._boostId: : Boost ID to be updated (correspond to its index in the `boosts` array)
params._increase: : Amount of AB Token increased (in token/seconds) to be granted by the boost

params._dropId: : Associated Drop ID corresponding to the token transferred

AB_REGISTRY.details: Address of Anotherblock Registry (used to store data incoming from L1 txs)

AB_RELAY.details: Address of Anotherblock Relay (used to control the streams destination based on L1 messages)

AB_TOKEN.details: Anotherblock Super Token streamed from this contract

baseFlowPerDrop.details: Stores the base flow for a given Drop ID

boosts.details: Array containing all existing & available Boosts

currentUserBoost.details: Stores the total boost increase for a given user

nbBoost.details: Total number of existing & available boosts

specialBoost.details: Stores the special boost increase for a given user

getFlow(address).notice: Get current flow information of the given address

getUserBoost(address).notice: Get current boost allocated to the given address

grantSpecialBoost(address,int96).notice: Grant a special boost to a given user

revokeSpecialBoost(address,int96).notice: Revoke a special boost to a given user

setBaseFlow(int96,uint256).notice: Set the base flow for a given Drop ID

updateStream(address,address,uint256).notice: Update the streams for the previous holder and the new holder
